text: Araby-kochevniki, ne vystupivshiye v pokhod, skazhut tebe: "Nas uderzhali [ot pokhoda] nashe imushchestvo i nashi sem'i. Posemu prosi proshcheniya dlya nas [u Allakha]". U nikh na ustakh - to, chego net v ikh serdtsakh. Sprosi [, Mukhammad]: "Kto zhe v sostoyanii [pomoch'] vam pered Allakhom khot' v chem-libo, yesli On zakhochet prichinit' vam vred ili yesli On zakhochet prinesti vam pol'zu?" Da nikto! I Allakh osvedomlen o tom, chto vy vershite
